1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica and Phoebe are preparing for Rachel’s baby

Hey
Hey
Hey
Hey
Hey
Hey

Also both of your sisters called and neither can make it

What?! You mean they’re not coming to a social event where
there’s no men and there’s no booze?! That’s shocking! I don’t care,
as long as my mom’s here
Oh my God, your mother
Oh my God, your mother
Oh my God, your mother
Oh my God, your mother

Well, given that we forgot to invite her it would be an awfully big
coincidence if she was
My God
My God
My God
My God
My God
Well it wasn’t my fault, Phoebe was in charge of the invitations

Well I don’t, I don’t have a mother so often I forget that
other people
(interrupting her) Oh give it a rest
(interrupting her) Oh give it a rest
So my mother is not coming to my baby shower?
No. (Pause) Neither is mine
No. (Pause) Neither is mine

Okay, y’know what? Don’t worry, okay? We’ll take care of
it. We’ll call her. Just go home and get ready

Please, make sure she comes. It’s really important to me, I mean
it’s my mom
I know. I know, what’s her number
I know. I know, what’s her number
I know. I know, what’s her number
I don’t know

Go! I have it in my book. Go! (Rachel leaves and Monica calls Mrs.
Green.) (To Phoebe) Wait a minute! If you’re in charge of the invitations why am I

Oh, hello Monica
Oh, hello Monica
Oh, hello Monica

(on phone) Hi, umm I know this is last minute, but we’ve decided to
throw an impromptu baby shower for Rachel today

I know, my daughter’s told me about it when they received their
impromptu invitations a month ago
Yeah, I’m sorry. I’m-I’m so sorry
Yeah, I’m sorry. I’m-I’m so sorry
For what dear? For not inviting me or lying about it

(To Phoebe) Oh my God, my ass is sweating! (on phone) Please! Please!
Can you come? It’s today at four
Well all right. I’ll see you at four
Well all right. I’ll see you at four
Thank you. (Hangs up.
Thank you. (Hangs up.
Isn’t it at three
Isn’t it at three
Son of a bitch! (Calls Mrs. Green again.

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Rachel’s baby shower is underway. Monica and Phoebe
are working in the kitchen.

lines.Line: Oh, I told the stripper to be here at five. That’s good right

What? He’s gonna be dressed as a baby! (Mrs. Green enters.) Oh hi
Mrs. Green
Hi
Hi
Hi
Hi
Hi
Hi
Hi
I’m so glad you could make it

Yes, thank you so much. And again, we’re so sorry. We could not

Try. There’s my little girl. (Goes over to Rachel.
Try. There’s my little girl. (Goes over to Rachel.
She’s still mad

Yeah I know. Isn’t it great? One less person we have to make small
talk with
Phoebe, Sandra’s mad at you too. It-it doesn’t bother you

No look, we’ve apologized twice! I can’t do anymore than that.
I know you hate it when people are mad at you but you just have to be okay with it
Okay. I can do that. (Pause) I gotta go powder my ass
Okay. I can do that. (Pause) I gotta go powder my ass
Cut to Rachel and Mrs. Green.
Cut to Rachel and Mrs. Green.

Look at that face! Just like when you were in high school! If I

Oh my look at that. Only three weeks to go, now have you picked your

Oh well actually gonna use a nanny and uh, I don’t even have a
housekeeper

Oh well actually gonna use a nanny and uh, I don’t even have a

It’s like you’re a cave person. Rachel, you must get a

Mrs. Kay! Oh yeah, she was sweet. She taught me Spanish. I actually

crazy.
Such a sweet woman
Such a sweet woman
Such a sweet woman

Oh Rachel
Oh Rachel
Oh Rachel
What
What
I just had the greatest idea! I’m gonna come live with you
Wh-wh-what? What
Wh-wh-what? What
Wh-wh-what? What

Oh, I’m so happy I’m gonna do this for my little girl. Aw,
look at you. You have tears in your eyes
Yes. Yes I do
Yes. Yes I do

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, the baby shower is continuing as Rachel walks over to
Monica and Phoebe.

lines.Line: Why did you invite my mother?
What
What
What
She wants to move in with me and Ross to help take care of the baby
For how long
For how long
For how long

Eight weeks. I mean I love my mother, but my God, a long lunch with her
is taxing
I personally would be honored if she wanted to live with me
She can’t hear you
She can’t hear you
She can’t hear you
What? You guys, come on! What am I going to do

Well, if you don’t want your mother to move in with you, just tell
her

You’re right. You’re right. I mean I’m about to have a
baby, I can tell my mother that I don’t want her to just be sleeping on my couch! Oh
my God! She’s gonna want to sleep in my bed with me. This cannot happen

That’s right. That is right, you go over there and tell her you
don’t want her to live with you. Do not take no for an answer
Okay. (She goes over to tell her mother.
Okay. (She goes over to tell her mother.
Okay. (She goes over to tell her mother.

Y’know what? And I’m just gonna swoop in there and be like the daughter she

Yes! Yes! And I think that the first gift that Rachel opens

Well uh, I don’t have a gift because I wasn’t invited

How about you less important people, let’s open your presents

lines.Character: (Mrs. Green goes into the kitchen and Rachel follows her

Oh look

Darling, that’s a breast pump

No! It’s where you put the dirty ones

Well that’s gross, why don’t you just take it outside and

Oh you’re gonna do that ten times a day
Oh you’re gonna do that ten times a day

What?! It goes ten times a day! What are we feeding this baby?! Indian

No dear, that’s what babies do
No dear, that’s what babies do
Rachel, listen to your mother. She is very smart

I don’t know, I’d leave it on the changing table? (Everyone

Oh come—(Stutters)—Of course I know that. I mean of course you

and this basket is beautiful
It’s actually a bassinet.
It’s actually a bassinet.
Okay mommy, don’t ever leave me. (Hugs her.

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, the baby shower has ended and everyone except for Mrs.
Green have left who is talking to Rachel while Monica and Phoebe are cleaning up.

lines.Line: So umm, you’re gonna stay with me as long as I need you

Of course I am

Oh mom, I swear I’m not an idiot. I’ve read all kinds of books

don’t know what to do. Oh, can I throw up in my diaper genie
No. Sweetie, you’re gonna be fine. (Starts to get up.

Monica and Chandler's, Mrs. Green is telling Ross what needs to be done to baby

…and all those dinosaur nick-knacks you have Ross, I thought
